name: Dilmah Cinnamon Tea Bags,20 pcs
description: The famed Island of Ceylon was sought by ancient explorers for its spices and, since the late 1800s, also for its tea. This tea is a combination of Ceylon’s finest produce – a Single Region Tea, grown at 4,000 feet elevation in the Dimbula valley, and Ceylon Cinnamon, known as ‘true Cinnamon’.   *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
